hero.title: Full-Stack Development Enhanced with AI
hero.subtitle: Helping businesses build modern web & mobile apps faster.

about.title: About Me
about.p1: I am a full-stack developer specializing in building modern web and mobile applications using AI-optimized workflows. I combine the speed of AI tools with the robustness of manual coding.
about.p2: My stack includes Flutter & React for interfaces, backed by Supabase & Firebase for scalable data. I focus on delivering complete solutions—from design to deployment.
about.p3: Whether it's a complex SaaS with multi-tenancy or a high-performance marketing site, I deliver quality code at twice the speed of traditional development.

featured.title: SyncBooking SaaS
featured.desc: A powerful multi-tenant platform enabling property owners to sync reservations via iCal and embed booking widgets directly into their websites.

contact.title: Let's Build Something
contact.subtitle: Have a project in mind? Let's discuss how we can build it faster.
